snippet: A larger and feistier Democratic majority could finally spell an end to filibuster abuse.
abstract: Editorial urges Senate's Democratic majority to alter body's rules in order to curb filibuster abuse and thereby increase efficiency of Congress; observes that crop of new, more liberal senators will be more willing to change rules, as several have already made clear.
lead_paragraph: A larger and feistier Democratic majority could finally spell an end to filibuster abuse.

headline.print_headline: A New Chance for the Senate
headline.seo: A New Chance for the Senate
headline.main: A New Chance for the Senate
